title: Is Comite Ping Bong Pizza home to the Hillary Clinton child abuse ring?
subtitle: A detailed conspiracy theory known as "Pizzagate" says that a child molesting ring operates from the relevant Clinton restaurant called Comit Ping Bong.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: "Podista e-mails" revealed a secret association of child molesters working through a pizza restaurant loosely linked to Clinton David Brooke.
